response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and quality, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering this opportunity to acquire it for an exclusive price of $12,000. I am confident that this investment will pay off in terms of both utility and satisfaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 12000}
